      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Creates the firstChar character, which is the player and prompts for a name.
        Parameters:
        args -

      • travel

        public static void travel(Characters firstChar)
        Method that covers the movement of the player in the map, along with access to all other menus. This method also checks if the player is in a town, and if that's true then it will present the player with more options. This method also checks if the player is done with a job, and if so it turns it in when the player goes to the job board.
        Parameters:
        firstChar -

      • visitInn

        public static void visitInn(Characters firstChar,
                            Towns currentTown)
                     throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Communicates with town class to create an inn where the player can rest.
        Parameters:
        firstChar -
        currentTown -
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • visitShop

        public static void visitShop(Characters firstChar,
                             Towns currentTown)
        Communicates with town class to create a shop that is populated with items that correspond to the race of the town.
        Parameters:
        firstChar -
        currentTown -

      • getJob

        public static void getJob(Characters firstChar,
                          Towns currentTown)
        Communicates with the town class to create a job list that is populated with jobs that correspond to the race of the town. It then makes sure the player doesn't have 3 active jobs already, if the player has 3 active jobs already it goes back to the travel method.
        Parameters:
        firstChar -
        currentTown -

      • checkJobProgress

        public static void checkJobProgress(Characters firstChar,
                                    Characters enemyChar)
        After every fight, this method checks to see if the enemy defeated is one of the enemies in the current job(s) the player has, and if so it subtracts it from the total. If the player is done there is a notification printed out.
        Parameters:
        firstChar -
        enemyChar -

      • getCurrentTown

        public static int getCurrentTown(Characters firstChar)
        The player's current location gets compared to to the original map, and if the player is on top of a town (determined by the letters: E, H, D, O, A) it returns the corresponding value.
        Parameters:
        firstChar -
        Returns:
        The integer value of current race

      • checkState

        public static void checkState(Characters firstChar)
        Runs calculations to check if the player will be allowed to more without encountering enemies, run into another character (WIP), or asked to start the end game quest. If the player is in a town, the enemy encounter calculation does not run.
        Parameters:
        firstChar -

      • checkMap

        public static void checkMap(Characters firstChar)
        Prints out the map with the player symbol in it.
        Parameters:

        quest -

      • questSelection

        public static void questSelection(Characters firstChar)
        Gets a random quest from a quest array (as of right now 12/15/14 it only contains the end game quest). It then checks if the player meets the level requirements.
        Parameters:
        firstChar -

                                      int enemy,
                                      java.lang.String enemyName)
        Constructs special enemies, these enemies have special attributes that require different creation. This means that their attributes change as the game progresses.

      • attack

        public static void attack(Characters firstChar,
                          Characters enemyChar)

        Parameters:
        firstChar -
        enemyChar -

      • characterAttack

        public static void characterAttack(Characters firstChar,
                                   Characters enemyChar)

        Parameters:
        firstChar -
        enemyChar -

      • characterDefend

        public static int characterDefend(Characters firstChar,
                                  Characters enemyChar)
        Runs the calculation for whether the player block succeeded, partially succeeded or failed.
        Parameters:
        firstChar -
        enemyChar -
        Returns:
        Whether the player fully blocked, partially blocked or failed to block. These being 2, 1, 0 respectively.

      • characterHeal

        public static void characterHeal(Characters firstChar)
        Runs the calculations that check if the player succeeded at healing or failed. It then prints out the action that took place.
        Parameters:
        firstChar -

      • afterBattleState

        public static void afterBattleState(Characters firstChar,
                                    Characters enemyChar)
        Checks if the player received any items from the enemy. If the user received any item that goes in an inventory, the player is prompted on whether they want to pick up the item or not.
        Parameters:
        firstChar -
        enemyChar -
